data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Sochi just outside Krasnodar's area.
In the minute 4, An attacking Sochi player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Sergei Petrov (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Christian Noboa.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sergey Karasev awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Krasnodar drives forward and Viktor Claesson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 12, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Krasnodar.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 13, Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Christian Noboa for Sochi is whistled offside.
Free kick Sochi.
In the minute 15, Sochi takes a corner from the left.
Sergey Terekhov of Sochi smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 17, Kristoffer Olsson is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Sochi's half.
In the minute 20, Sochi's Kirill Zaika misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Krasnodar's Remy Cabella has run offside.
In the minute 21, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Sergey Karasev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Sochi's half.
Sergey Karasev has awarded Sochi a corner.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 28, Free kick in a good position for Krasnodar!
Anton Zabolotnyi is booked for the home team.
Remy Cabella (Krasnodar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sergey Karasev has awarded Krasnodar a corner.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sochi's Nikita Burmistrov is on target but unsuccessful.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 32, Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar pushes forward through Marcus Berg, whose finish on goal is saved.
Daniil Utkin of Krasnodar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Daniil Utkin of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 40, Soslan Dzhanaev is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Soslan Dzhanaev is back on his feet again.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Sochi are coming forward and Joaozinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 45, Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Sergey Karasev has awarded Krasnodar a corner.
The first-half is over.
Artur Yusupov (Sochi) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar make their first substitution with Yuri Gazinskiy replacing Kristoffer Olsson.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Christian Noboa (Sochi) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 49, Sergey Karasev signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Sochi's half.
Krasnodar drive upfield and Marcus Berg gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sochi defender.
Igor Smolnikov of Krasnodar is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 52, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Sochi takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 53, Free kick Krasnodar.
Kirill Zaika (Sochi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Sochi's area.
Sochi will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Krasnodar.
In the minute 55, Sochi's Kirill Zaika has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Cristian Ramirez is on a sub for Tonny Vilhena for Krasnodar.
In the minute 58, Krasnodar pushes forward through Cristian Ramirez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal! Sergei Petrov equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
The home team replace Joaozinho with Ivan Miladinovic.
In the minute 61, Sochi to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Yuri Gazinskiy (Krasnodar) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
Sochi are caught offside.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Krasnodar drives forward and Daniil Utkin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
Krasnodar's Remy Cabella is on target but unsuccessful.
Krasnodar drive forward but Yuri Gazinskiy is judged offside.
In the minute 69, In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Sergey Karasev awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Krasnodar are pushing forward but Remy Cabella's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Shapi Suleymanov is replacing Marcus Berg for the away team.
In the minute 77, Sochi make their second substitution with Danyl Prutsev replacing Nikita Burmistrov.
Egor Prutsev is replacing Anton Zabolotnyi for the home team.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 79, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 82, Sergey Karasev has awarded Krasnodar a corner.
The away team replace Sergei Petrov with Maksim Kutovoy.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
In the minute 84, Sergey Terekhov (Sochi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Krasnodar takes a corner from the right.
Krasnodar drives forward and Viktor Claesson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 86, Throw-in high up the field for Krasnodar in Sochi.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Shapi Suleymanov's finish is wide of the goal.
Sergey Karasev awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Igor Smolnikov is booked for the away team.
Sochi's Sergey Terekhov is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 89, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sergey Terekhov.
Sochi have a goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shapi Suleymanov of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Sochi.
Krasnodar takes a corner from the left.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Ivan Novoseltsev is on a sub for Egor Prutsev for Sochi.
